title: Danish for Beginners
headline: Explore and learn Danish vocabulary and language skills in this free online course for effective communication.
description: Learn to converse in Danish with this course designed for beginners. You will explore basic vocabulary and communication skills used in day-to-day conversations, greetings, self-introduction and social interactions. Other aspects you'll master include counting, identifying colours, foods, dates and time. We will also discuss grammar and show you how to conjugate verbs to help you form good sentences and communicate effectively. Enrol today.
courseDescription:
This Danish course for beginners will teach you basic vocabulary and language skills to help you communicate with native Danish speakers. Spoken by about six million people worldwide, most living in Denmark, Danish is the official language of this European country. You will start by studying each of the twenty-nine letters in the Danish alphabet before exploring the vocabulary for greetings, self-introductions and expressing good manners. 

We will then introduce vocabulary for a variety of topics that include: colours, food, animals and exercise. You will learn to use these words in simple sentences, giving you the confidence to apply them in conversations. Next, we will explore important verbs in Danish. We will discuss verbs such as ‘to have’, ‘to go’ and ‘to know’ - often changing the form depending on how you use them. There are a few rules to aid your understanding of how to utilize these words correctly when constructing sentences. Additionally, we will review and practise lessons that cover numbers, colours and manners.

The last topic will introduce the lessons on how to tell the time in Danish. You will study the days of the week, months of the year and learn how to describe dates. The practice tutorials in each lesson will help you attain fluency in no time. Whatever your motivation is for learning Danish, like studying, tourism or business, this beginner's course will give you a kick start. Why wait? Start today!
